productDescription.EN: For all your chopping needs, our kitchen chopping board set is a kitchen must have. Our set of two plastic chopping boards have our clever silver finish embedded into their durable plastic design to give an antibacterial finish to keep your kitchen sanitary and safe. With contrast edges that give a secure grip on any kitchen surface, these chopping boards are easy to wipe clean and also dishwasher safe. With a grip handle, these chopping boards come in a handy pack of two so you’ll safely be able to chop meat and veggies separately.

Our small flip lock storage jar is ideal for tea bags, instant coffee or ground granules and coffee, keeping them fresh and neatly organised. With a simple flip of its lock, these containers create a tight seal for prolonged freshness of all their contents. Looking neat and chic on your kitchen countertop, these jars are 10cm high and have a 0.5l capacity. Nestle them together for food storage that still makes a style statement.

Our medium flip lock jar offers a capacity of 0.8 litres and is 15cm high, ideal for keeping all your food fresh and securely stored, whether its tea bags, rice, pasta, dried fruit or flour. Made of durable plastic, these jars seal with an easy flick of their top lock, and boast modern and simple style that will look fantastic on any kitchen counter, for a stylish and effective storage solution.

productDescription.EN: Our large flip lock container is made of durable plastic and will keep everything from pasta, tea and coffee fresh and securely stored. Offering clean and modern design that fits just as neatly in classic dÃ©cor, this storage jar offers 20cm in height for plenty of storage space. An easy to use flip lock top lets the jar and its contents be completely sealed with a simple flick.

productDescription.EN: A captivating scent to introduce a sense of opulence and glamour into your life, this women’s eau de toilette might just be your new signature scent. This women’s fragrance is centred around a luxurious floral heart with aromatic saffron accords, all beautifully accented by warm and spicy notes.

Our large flip lock container is ideal for keeping cereals, pasta, rice and flour fresh and neatly organised in your cupboards. Do away with unsightly packaging and enjoy a more stylish, far more effective storage solution with these sleek jars to keep food fresh and neatly stored.

productDescription.EN: When life gives you lemons, we give you this wonderfully cheerful lemon juicer to make the most of them! With a durable and robust design that’s easy to hold and use, it will take no time at all to have all the juice you need to make lemonade, or tasty salad dressings. Giving maximum results with minimum effort, the hinged design of this metal lemon squeezer lets lemon halves to be easily placed inside and then squeezed in one easy motion.
productDescription.ZH: عندما تهديك الحياة الليمون، نهديك نحن هذه العصارة المبهجة لتحقيق أقصى استفادة منه! تتميز بتصميم متين قوي التحمل سهل الحمل والاستخدام، فلن يستغرق الأمر سوى لحظات معدودة لإعداد كمية العصير التي تحتاجها بالكامل أو تجهيز تتبيلات السلطة اللذيذة. يمنحك التصميم المفصلي أفضل النتائج بأقل مجهود؛ فليس عليك سوى وضع نصف الليمونة داخل هذه العصارة المعدنية بكل سهولة وعصرها بضغطة واحدة.

productDescription.EN: An essential helping hand for frying the perfect tasty omelette, whipping up meringues or spreading cream onto sweet treats, our spatula has a range of kitchen applications. Made of stainless steel and with a silicone head for extra flexibility and heat resistance that's safe for use on non-stick cookware, this metal spatula is dishwasher safe for easy cleaning, and can be easily hung up to store with an in-built hanging hoop.
productDescription.ZH: An essential helping hand for frying the perfect tasty omelette, whipping up meringues or spreading cream onto sweet treats, our spatula has a range of kitchen applications. Made of stainless steel and with a silicone head for extra flexibility and heat resistance that's safe for use on non-stick cookware, this metal spatula is dishwasher safe for easy cleaning, and can be easily hung up to store with an in-built hanging hoop.

productDescription.EN: Our stainless steel spoon gives extra convenient and long lasting performance to your kitchen utensil collection. With a head made of reinforced polyamide, this serving spoon is designed to be extra heat resistant and safe to use with non-stick pans. A thick handle gives easy and secure grip while an integrated loop makes it easy to hang and store. Dishwasher safe, cleaning up after a few hours of slaving over the stove is made easy.

Our stainless steel turner has endless kitchen applications, whether it’s flipping pancakes, turning fried eggs or lifting roast potatoes from the pan. Made with a durable and high performing stainless steel body, a nylon head offers extra flexibility and heat resistance, as well as being safe to use with non-stick surfaces and pans. Dishwasher safe, keeping this turner clean is easy, and a Tarnish Resistant finish ensures it won’t rust or discolour.
productDescription.ZH: ملعقة التقليب هذه المصنوعة من الفولاذ المقاوم للصدأ يمكن أن تُستخدم في المطبخ في استخدامات لا حصر لها، سواءً أكنت تقلبين الفطائر أو البيض المقلي أو ترفعين البطاطا المشوية من المقلاة. جسمها متين وعالي الأداء مصنوع من فولاذ مقاوم للصدأ، ولها رأس من النايلون يوفّر مرونة زائدة ومقاومة للحرارة، وكذلك يمكن استخدامها بأمان مع الأسطح والأوعية غير القابلة للالتصاق. يمكن غسلها في غسالة الأطباق، والمحافظة على نظافة ملعقة التقليب هذه أمر سهل، فيما تضمن اللمسة المقاومة للتصبغات أنها لن تصدأ ولن تبهت ألوانها.

productDescription.EN: Marvellous mashed potatoes every time, our stainless steel masher gives secure grip and durable wear to give fluffy mash time after time. A stainless steel body gives durable build while a potato masher head made of reinforced polyamide gives better heat resistance and makes it safe for use on non-stick pans. A hanging loop makes for easy storage and itâ€™s dishwasher safe and Tarnish Resistant so it will stay looking its best wash after wash.

For a fuss free way to prepare garlic without smelly fingertips or tricky chopping, this garlic press is easy to use and built to last, with stainless steel constructionsand Tarnish Resistant finish. Giving freshly crushed garlic with next to no effort, simply place peeled or unpeeled bulbs inside and give a squeeze for perfectly crushed garlic every time. Dishwasher safe, it’s easy to keep this metal garlic press clean and ready for use.
productDescription.ZH: من أجل تحضير الثوم بطريقة سهلة ومن دون متاعب، ومن دون أن تعلق على أطراف أصابعك رائحة الثوم، ومن دون الحاجة لعملية تقطيع مزعجة، هرّاسة الثوم هذه عملية ومصنوعة كي تدوم طويلاً من هيكل من الفولاذ المقاوم للصدأ مع لمسة نهائية مقاومة للتصبغات. تعطيك ثومًا مهروسًا من دون تعب، ضعي أسنان الثوم المقشرة أو غير المقشرة في الداخل واضغطي من أجل الحصول على ثوم مهروس كما تحبين في كل مرة. يمكن غسلها في غسالة الأطباق؛ الحفاظ على هرّاسة الثوم المعدنية هذه نظيفة وجاهزة للاستخدام أمر سهل.

productDescription.EN: Cut pizza with ease and precision with our stainless steel pizza wheel cutter, a kitchen essential for any enthusiast of Italyâ€™s tastiest export. Made of stainless steel for durable, long lasting performance, this pizza slicer glides through all types of pizza to give perfect slices. With a large diameter bladed wheel to make light work of cutting through thick and thin crusts, an integrated hoop makes for easy storage, while simple cleaning is assured by this handy slicer being totally dishwasher safe.

Peel potatoes, carrots or parsnips with ease with our y-peeler, a kitchen must have that makes light work of skinning veggies or making them into neat ribbons. A swivel blade easily conforms to even the bumpiest of potatoes, for easy peeling every time. Made of stainless steel to be durable and hardwearing, a loop makes it easy to hang and store this potato peeler, which is also dishwasher safe and Tarnish Resistant for easy cleaning and long lasting shine.

Whether itâ€™s whipping creams, meringues or tasty marinades, a balloon whisk is a kitchen essential for a range of recipes and any busy home chef. Our stainless steel balloon whisk is made to be fantastically durable, ready to whip up tasty treats for plenty mealtimes to come, and being both dishwasher safe and Tarnish Resistant, itâ€™s easy to keep it neat and looking its best. With a hang hoop for easy storage, this is a great hand whisk for any kitchen collection.
productDescription.ZH: Whether itâ€™s whipping creams, meringues or tasty marinades, a balloon whisk is a kitchen essential for a range of recipes and any busy home chef. Our stainless steel balloon whisk is made to be fantastically durable, ready to whip up tasty treats for plenty mealtimes to come, and being both dishwasher safe and Tarnish Resistant, itâ€™s easy to keep it neat and looking its best. With a hang hoop for easy storage, this is a great hand whisk for any kitchen collection.

productDescription.EN: Summer canâ€™t arrive without a trusty ice cream scoop, and luckily ours, made of durable stainless steel to see you through many seasons to come, is just the thing for perfect scoops of tasty ice cream. With a thick handle for easy and secure grip, our stainless steel ice cream scoop is perfect for popping in the fridge to keep cool to prevent ice cream from melting too soon. With an integrated hoop for easy hanging and storage, itâ€™s also dishwasher safe for fuss free cleaning.
productDescription.ZH: Summer canâ€™t arrive without a trusty ice cream scoop, and luckily ours, made of durable stainless steel to see you through many seasons to come, is just the thing for perfect scoops of tasty ice cream. With a thick handle for easy and secure grip, our stainless steel ice cream scoop is perfect for popping in the fridge to keep cool to prevent ice cream from melting too soon. With an integrated hoop for easy hanging and storage, itâ€™s also dishwasher safe for fuss free cleaning.

productDescription.EN: Whether it’s orange zest for a cake, garlic for a marinade or lemon zest for a salad, every kitchen needs a grater and our stainless steel grater is fantastically durable and able to answer all your cooking needs. This zest grater features fine blades, ideal for fine grating for sauces and mixes, and also features a silicone base for secure grip on kitchen surfaces. A hanging hoop makes storing easy and, being dishwasher safe, cleaning is a breeze too.
productDescription.ZH: لا غنى عن المبشرة في كل مطبخ سواءً أكانت لبشر قشر البرتقال لإعداد كعكة شهية، أو بشر الثوم لتحضير صلصة غنية، أو قشر الليمون لتتبيل سلطة لذيذة، وتتميز مبشرتنا من الفولاذ المقاوم للصدأ بتصميم فائق المتانة سيلبي جميع احتياجاتك في المطبخ. تتميز مبشرة القشر بشفرات رفيعة مثالية للبشر الناعم للصلصات والخلطات اللذيذة، كما تتميز بقاعدة من السيليكون لسهولة تثبيتها بإحكام على أسطح المطبخ. تتزيّن بحلقة تعليق لسهولة التخزين، كما يمكن غسلها بغسالة الأطباق لضمان راحتك.

productDescription.EN: Wine connoisseurs and appreciators of good beer will definitely want this corkscrew among their kitchen essentials. A tried, tested and trusted design, simply twist this stainless steel corkscrew into your cork and watch as the arms lift, squeeze down and enjoy easy wine uncorking with next to no effort. With a handy bottle opener in the handle that doubles as a hanging loop, this corkscrew is the key to dinner refreshments.
productDescription.ZH: Wine connoisseurs and appreciators of good beer will definitely want this corkscrew among their kitchen essentials. A tried, tested and trusted design, simply twist this stainless steel corkscrew into your cork and watch as the arms lift, squeeze down and enjoy easy wine uncorking with next to no effort. ProductTitle.EN: Rubber Rectangular Non Slip Shower Mat
ProductTitle.ZH: دواسة دُش مطاطية مستطيلة الشكل ومقاومة للانزلاق

productDescription.EN: This simple shower mat will provide you will extra grip while rinsing off after a hard day’s work. Made from a sturdy rubber construction, you know this mat will stand the test of time. An anti-bacterial finish prevents germs and mould from growing on this rubber mat, helping keep your bathroom clean for longer.
productDescription.ZH: ستمنحك دواسة الاستحمام بتصميمها البسيط مزيدًا من الثبات لمقاومة الانزلاق عند الاستحمام بعد يوم عمل شاق. مصنوعة من نسيج مطاطي متين يقاوم التمزق والبلى لتبقى معك لسنوات طويلة. وتتميز بلمسة نهائية مضادة للبكتيريا تمنع نمو الجراثيم وتكون العفن على هذه الدواسة المطاطية، ما يساعد على بقاء حمامك نظيفًا لفترة أطول.
